scripts.install-packages: yarn workspace @shared/first build && yarn dlx prisma generate --schema=./apps/server/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.install-vercel: corepack enable && corepack prepare yarn@4.9.1 --activate && yarn install
scripts.dev: yarn workspace @shared/first dev & yarn install && turbo dev --parallel
scripts.build: yarn dlx prisma generate --schema=./apps/server/prisma/schema.prisma && turbo build --parallel
scripts.build-client: yarn dlx tsx vercel-ignore-build-step.ts && turbo build --filter=client...
